name: Mad Dog 2: The Lost Gold
description:
Mad Dog's Back!

It's up to you, partner! Stop Mad Dog and his vicious henchmen and get that gold! But it won't be easy... Along the way you'll have to make tough decisions about which guide to trust, and which trails to follow. Choose the wrong path, and you could end up in a shootout where you don't stand a chance. But play your cards right and you'll make it to the final showdown where you'll let Mad Dog know who rules the territory!

Relive the glory of the American Wild West with an American Laser Games Arcade Classic!

Other exciting features for this release include:
- Updated Gameplay
- Includes All Original Play Modes
- Remastered Game Footage
- Test Your Reflexes In Showdowns
- Play with your friends in local multiplayer mode

1-4 players
200KB minimum save size
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
Network Features
PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye camera required.
PlayStation®Move navigation controller or Wireless Controller optional.
